spell_list.description: The Animalist gains a passive effect that triggers when using advantages. The group receives a Potency increase. Additionally, if Feral Stance is active, the group gains Crit Bonus and if Spiritual Stance is active, the group will receive more healing from all incoming heals.
spell_list.description_pvp: The Animalist gains a passive effect that triggers when using advantages. The group receives a Potency increase. Additionally, if Feral Stance is active, the group gains Crit Bonus and if Spiritual Stance is active, the group will receive more healing from all incoming heals.

effect_list.description: When using an Advantage ability. this spell has a 20% chance to cast Advantageous Advance on target.  Lasts for 10.0 seconds.
If in Spiritual Stance
Increases healing received by 10.00%
Increases Potency of group members (AE) by 10.0%
When using an Advantage ability. this spell has a 20% chance to cast Advantageous Advance on target.  Lasts for 10.0 seconds.
Increases Potency of group members (AE) by 10.0%
If in Feral Stance
Increases Crit Bonus of group members (AE) by 15.0%
